projects.title: Inventory management system
projects.description: Designed and implemented a customized inventory system for a small paper product business, addressing their specific needs in operations, billing, and reporting, as well as aligning with ISO/IEC 25010 standards. Through meticulous requirement gathering and architectural design, documented in IEEE 829, SRS, and SAD.

projects.title: Supermarket shopping platform
projects.description: Developed and implemented a distributed database system for a supermarket shopping platform across four different servers in different countries. The system is able to generate reports on the most popular products, the most popular brands, and the most popular categories.

projects.title: Earthquake monitoring system
projects.description: Developed and implemented a data tracking system for earthquakes in Java. The system is able to track the location, magnitude, and time of earthquakes. The system also has the ability to track the number of earthquakes that occur in a given time period and notify users via email.

projects.title: Real state website
projects.description: Designed and programmed a real state website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website is able to display information about the properties and the company. The website also has a contact form that sends an email to the company.

projects.title: Coffee blog website
projects.description: Designed and programmed a coffee blog website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The blog contains information about types of coffee, tips and offers workshops. As well as a contact form that sends an email to the company.
